ServiceProblemEventRecord.description: A record of an event (related to a service problem) received from another system

eventTime.description: Time at which the event occurred

id.description: Identifier of the service problem event record.

recordTime.description: Time at which the record was created

serviceProblem.description: The service problem to which this record applies

notification.description: A notification from the possible notifications for Service Problem (such as creation, status change, information required, change)
